reviewText: Not 3D just looks like a curved picture.

another  movie that is not in 3d that says it is . the signal and menu are 3d but the movie has no aspect change between left and right eye views . only movies authored in U.S.A. and Japan are true 3d and possibly china . but be warned , if it does not say real d then it should be suspect .has english track and region free .
sadly, the US DVD has the restored(great) Smithee version. it is on a Mexican 2 sided disc..rip it before it goes bad as all Mexican DVD 19s do..
